name: Fire Leaf Water
description:
Fire Leaf Water is a fast paced game of "Rock Paper Scissors" where you constantly have to maintain your elements between 4 and 0 before time runs out.

How to Play
  • Don't hit 5 or 0
  • Same elements lose 1
  • Weak elements lose 2
  • Strong elements gain other elements
Controls

Mouse or Numpad (1 - 3)
